DOC.brief_title: Proof Concept Study MTC896 Gel Reduce Sebum Production Forehead Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled proof-of-concept study investigational product ( 0.75 % ( w/w ) MTC896 Gel ) compare placebo control . Subjects randomize 1 2 treatment group , 0.75 % ( w/w ) MTC896 Gel Placebo . Approximately 134 subject enrol yield 60 complete subject group . One group receive daily topical application 0.75 % ( w/w ) MTC896 Gel forehead 28 consecutive day , receive placebo identical regimen . Enrollment stagger allow monitoring safety tolerability . A lead cohort include approximately 20 subject ( 10 MTC896 Group 10 Placebo Group ) . Application additional subject initiate lead cohort complete study .
